title: * LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! HOME HAS NEVER FLOODED *
posting_body: HOME HAS NEVER FLOODED Only minutes away from NRG stadium, Medical Center,Rice University,as well as easy access to the convenient 610 loop.

Home has been completely remodeled in February of 2019.Remodel includes:new foundation around the house new pipe sewer,new water line, fresh paint indoor and outdoor,new windows double pane and low-E,recent roof (5-6 years old),remodeled both bathrooms with new sink,bathtub,& tile,new 2.5" blinds,new indoor/outdoor doors,new water heater,new electric rewire with ground and box (200amps),smoke alarms in each room,new front 6-foot fence,new air conditioner and furnace,new ceiling fans in each room,remodeled kitchen with new sink,dishwasher,lights, air vent,garbage disposal,backsplash tiles,refinished hardwood floors,new kitchen and family room tiles,new front porch posts,and new landscaping.
